items.prompt: Working from home is called ______ work.
items.explanation: Trabajar desde casa se llama 'remote work'.

items.prompt: A card that exists only in your phone is a ______ card.
items.explanation: Una tarjeta que solo existe en el móvil es una 'virtual card'.

items.prompt: I need a [blank] for my laptop expense.
items.explanation: Necesitas el recibo (receipt) para justificar un gasto.

items.prompt: When the company pays you back for an expense, it is a ______.
items.explanation: Cuando la empresa te devuelve el dinero de un gasto, es un 'reimbursement'.

items.prompt: Match the terms with their meanings:
items.explanation: Relaciona los términos con sus significados.

items.prompt: Could I [blank] a virtual card, please?

items.explanation: Una tarjeta desechable (disposable) es de un solo uso.
Gasto se dice 'expense' en un contexto de negocios.

items.prompt: Ask your boss for a new monitor for your home office.
items.scenario:
Employee: Hello. I am working from home now.
Boss: Do you need anything?
Employee: ______
options: Could I have a new monitor as an expense?
items.explanation: Petición educada: 'Could I have a new monitor as an expense?'.

items.prompt: Where do you find your virtual card number?
items.explanation: Los datos de la tarjeta virtual están en la app del banco.

items.prompt: Which one is a business expense?
